Name: Fiore I: Daffodil
About the game: The story centres around humanity fight against an enemy that take control of one’s sin to create monsters and havoc in the world. You’ll follow the new agent, Solomon Knight as he fights this monster known as the Harbinger. Fiore I: Daffadil is an action platformer game. Follow the story and unlock several skills to improve your chances in the hostile world . Replay the missions and try alternate strategies One story related boss and 8 alternate ones.
